comments.comment: mAP, P, R are still 0 even after 20+ epoches
My case is also one-class but not encountered this issue. Maybe check the annotation again?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rinabuoy>@rinabuoy</denchmark-link> the tutorial datasets are there for you to start from, so that you can reproduce the results shown before starting off on your own adventures. This is highly recommended. That way you know that the repo is functioning correctly before applying to custom data. If then you don't get results on your custom data, your custom data is likely at fault (i.e. improper labels), or you simply don't have enough training data for the network to generalize well to your validation set.
